title: On a More Serious Note
content:
Who ever it is who's responsible for that damned DDOS attack on twitter, Facebook and Blogger needs to come here to get my shoe up their backside.
But of course, you're not going to take the time to read my blog, are you? May rodent insects gnaw your eyes and fish infested rabbits chew out your stomach. You wasted a full two minutes of my valuable being bored time this morning. I hope you're going to pay me back for that...
